website_summaries.verdict: A solid choice backed by the manufacturer to ensure customer satisfaction.
pros: Offers a postpartum belt and nursing cover
Boasts a 30-day money-back guarantee and lifetime replacement
cons: The fabric may be too warm, but it is also durable

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitten Holder!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a way to cuddle kittens. I work at an animal rescue shelter and the kittens are constantly wanting to be held but I can't always do that when there is work to be done. I used this wrap, folding it in half creating a pouch to put the kitten in, and then wrapping the kitten to my chest. Worked perfectly. The material for the wrap is a little on the thick side so making a knot to secure it was a bit difficult so knocking off one star for that but otherwise, totally satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BAG691

customer_reviews.title: too small!
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good idea, but for us, the big flaw is that it's too small. If you stretch it tight all around, I can just get enough fabric to tie a small double knot in front - NOTHING like the woman in the video. I don't know if it's because I'm a dad and 6'2" and it's not made for me, but my wife can barely do the same. Was excited to get this and now am just disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Balikian

customer_reviews.title: Only ok if you're skinny
customer_reviews.text: Not made for anyone who isn't small. I'm a size 14 and couldn't use it because the material isn't long enough to tie securely. The company assured me that the fabric would stretch with use and give more length, but I couldn't tie it to use it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: valerie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love it! It's so soft and keeps my little ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It's so soft and keeps my little one snug and safe. I love it for grocery shopping and anywhere where a bulky stroller won't work. She just snoozes the whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Not for all sizes
customer_reviews.text: I did alot of research before choosing the cuddle bug since the company says one size fits all and several other reasons. After several attempts it is not for a woman with extra curves (I don't even wear plus size clothing).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of baby wraps and bought this one because the price was better than better known name brands. Unfortunately, the width of this one is only 10", compared to the typical 20" or 21" of the other brands. This means there's less fabric to securely wrap your baby, resulting in having to hold the baby with at least one arm/hand the whole time you wear him/her. I'll be buying a different one that's wider so that I don't have to hold my baby with my arm the whole time I wear him/her.
customer_reviews.author: MRB

customer_reviews.title: She Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Love it! She will sleep for hours on my chest while I have her in this. Since my hands are free I can sit down and play a video game, make food, use my phone ( she is in it right now as I write this lol).
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to get things done around the house😁
customer_reviews.text: At first I wasn’t so sure about it. I looked up a few videos on how to wrap it, and practiced it a few times. Now that i have it down its great. Definitely able to fit anyone of any size. Im 5ft 2 and 125. It has lots of extra room so i just tie it in a few knots at the end. Comfy with baby in it . If i wear her for too long my back starts to hurt but thats kinda expected. Stretchy and seems to be breathable material. Definitely a great and useful product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just like Boba!
customer_reviews.text: Just like Boba wrap but cheaper. My son when he was 1 month-2 months he would only take long naps on my chest. So needing to work from home and actually get stuff done I would put this on before we started our morning routine. Then when he feel asleep I would sneak his feet in and stand, walk to the bathroom mirror and adjust him. It’s soft and stretchy but durable. Do not buy Baby Kat’n (our original purchase) wrap bc the sizing has to fit you very tight for it to actually hold your baby up...I should have just put this one on my registry instead!
customer_reviews.author: WildeMamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I am not by any means a “baby wearer” but when I couldn’t put my infant down without crying, it has been a big help. I watched a quick tutorial video on how to wrap her, and it was pretty simple. A lot easier than expected. The material is stretchy and soft, which I love. I had previously purchased a baby carrier that was too bulky to use around the house. This is a good one!!
customer_reviews.author: Kerrie R.

customer_reviews.title: Necessity!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have for any infant! My little one has reflux, so he needs to stay upright most of the time. Putting him in the wrap after eating helps tremendously and momma can still get work done. My son was also premature, so I needed something that would fit his little 5 pound self! He is now 8 pounds and I still use it daily. We live in the South, so it does get hot. I just wear the wrap when we are indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not into it
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a nice product. It holds snug, is soft, my son liked it, but I am just not into baby wearing. A couple hours with my 12 pound baby hanging from my stomach just kills my back. I can’t believe some people think this helps provide back relief... Sure it’s not just this wrap - they all provide the same basic function. Bending down is tough, my legs can only do so many squats. I also wonder if heavier folks may find this too small. I am pretty slender (size 0-2 normally) and I had some extra slack but if you were double my size it might be getting small.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I liked how easy this was to put in. Baby wraps seem kinda complex and i don’t want to drop my baby. This wrap provided very good support and was very comfortable for me to wear. The directions in the box for easy to understand and I was able to easily place the baby in it the first time I tried it. The stretching us of the material provides enough comfort for the baby and get enough strings for me to feel confident that the baby is not going to fall out of it. I can’t comment on how long it will last because I just got this however I do envision myself using it for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lene

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this baby wrap. It is affordable and it gets the job done. The fabric isn't too hot and baby is secure if wrapped correctly. There are instructional videos on youtube and the wrap comes with an instructional pamphlet which makes it easy to learn how to wrap your baby. I have seen other brands that are over $100 for the same thing. I am not sponsored by CuddleBug and I purchased this product on my own based on the reviews that I read.
customer_reviews.author: Eva G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a week and honestly I was sceptacle. But my one month old daughter loves it. She’ll be crabby in the evenings and within a couple minutes she’s calm. During the day I am able to cook and clean and when she starts to wake up I bounce a bit and she’s happy. I don’t think it’s done anything for helping the longer naps for longer sleeps at night but for day time it really helps
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Too Stretchy - Baby Sags
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to make this work...the material was too stretchy to keep my son up on my chest, so I always felt like he was slipping. I attempted to cinch as tight as possible, but the material seems to have too much give. It was also difficult to get the wrap to provide adequate head / neck support without smashing baby's head against me. i wanted to like it, but a structured carrier works much better in my case.
customer_reviews.author: Cerah13

customer_reviews.title: Affordable baby-wearing option for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I loved using this wrap to wear our baby. It worked great for the first few months. Once she started getting older and more wiggly, we switched to a baby backpack. But for the first few months, this wrap was awesome and our baby loved being in it. I would take her for walks in it, great for keeping her close when out in public, and she usually fell asleep in it. It was long enough for me to use, but not so much for my hubby. Great, inexpensive option - much more affordable than some other wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri

customer_reviews.title: Having a free hand
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is anxious to get in, and at six months he is tall and very active, think he might have dad's ADHD, so I keep one hand on him in front and have the other hand free, which was no longer happening without the Snuggle Bug, as I needed both hands to keep him under control with his action. So I am very happy. And if you have a calm child, you have both hands free. Just need adjusting in the crotch area for proper coverage and not pinching, I love the Snuggle Bug.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing & calming for baby
customer_reviews.text: After reading multiple reviews and watching videos, I decided to purchase this for my newest grandbaby. I am so glad I did, I am thrilled with how it helps to soothe and calm a fussy baby. Not sure if it's from the closeness or the confinement, but it works wonders. I feel it is very safe and supportive of newborns, and plan on using this as the baby grows.
customer_reviews.author: Shebear

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wish I had one when my kids were little
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recieved one of your CuddleBug at her baby shower.She loves it ,it so easy to use. She was afraid of people getting to close to her little one with the flu season starting. So she wraps our little one nice an snug . It is very comfortable and secure.So I showed my step daughter well visiting since she had her little one 2 months after my daughter. She loved it so much I bought her one. 1 thing both girls really like,is it so longer than other ones out there, they both are 5’10. It I would recommend this to anyone having Baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This might be a really great wrap. I just don’t have the patience for it. Very long strip of material that drags on the ground until you get it all tied up on your body. Not very convenient. I don’t see how anyone would be able to get a baby secured in this by themself.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you're like me and ONLY buy after reading great reviews about a product, then read my review and simply press the buy button! (I buy from Amazon at least once a week!) Honestly, this product was just as described and very cute packaging. It shipped really fast too. I look for quality when buying anything and this met my standards 100%. I'm not too big on writing reviews all the time but I took the time out to do so because I'm very please with this purchase. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nellygal45

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I wanted to be able to carry my 1 month old around but also be able to get some things done around the house. All of the reviews were convincing so I took the plunge. The material is sturdy but breathable, long enough so that my husband can also use this as well. I looked up a cuddlebug video on YouTube to learn how to tie it. It's so easy! Best $30 I have ever spent!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Ander

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. You can use for newborns just make sure one of the straps goes over the head to support it. It's very breathable. I have worn it outside in August heat and baby did not overheat at all. I have also walked 4 miles using this and it did not bother my back at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Smith

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just had a baby boy one month ago and we have been using this sling Faithfully for about two weeks now. He is a very fussy baby that likes to be against me all the time and I keep this sling on me most of the day. This sling is very comfortable and easy to use, I watched the Youtube video and it's easy to put on the more you use it. My son loves it he is really content in this sling and he falls asleep all the time. The material is very soft and not hot at all, I highly recommend this sling.
customer_reviews.author: L. Vample

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had a chance to use yet, but seems great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wrap in preparation for the arrival of my son. The little guy is being stubborn, though, and hasn't desided to make an appearance. This unfortunately makes it difficult for me to review this item. What I can say is it seems of great quality. The fabric is soft and comfortable. It comes with a little drawingstring bag that I think will come in handy for portability. I am excited to try this puppy out! Once I do I will update my review:)
customer_reviews.author: Britney (BookDrunkSloth)

customer_reviews.title: Packable, comfy and washable. Great for those with limited space.
customer_reviews.text: We have twins, one of which only seems to be happy when laying on mom/dad. This wrap is a fabulous way to keep him happy so I can give attention to the other one. We bought two and strap the babies to us while we do chores around the house! They're really comfortable and easy to use once you get the hang of them. I like that they told up super small and are washable too. You kind of need to use a hand to support the head of smaller babies, but that's ok. It'll be great when they're a bit older and we can be totally hand free.
customer_reviews.author: al

customer_reviews.title: Great for around the house
customer_reviews.text: Took me a couple of YouTube videos to figure out how to wrap, but once I did it’s been like magic. I can eat and do laundry while my baby is nice and cozy. I wouldn’t wear it out of the house because I use another carrier with more back support, but it’s great for around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Coffeeldy

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after only the second use
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the sling, it looked great; however, after only wearing it twice in the house, the fabric ripped. I only saw it had severely ripped when I went to tie it up again. The fabric was faulty and flimsy as have no idea how this happened (my 1 month old son surely should not be able to tear it) The fabric itself was faulty. Save your money and buy a better more sturdy brand/fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Looks soft and breathable
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was really fast. My baby is not here yet so I haven't been able to try the wrap. The wrapping instructions are very clear and in multiple languages. I was just disappointed that there were no care instructions on the product or in the bag. You have to visit the website for that. Too bad, a little tag could do it ! Overall I love the fabric, real soft and looks breathable.
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: It looks like a long nylon strechable scarf
customer_reviews.text: I do mot recommand for the new born.. My boy is 8lbs and tried this yesterday and it is totally not safe for the little baby.It looks like a long nylon strechable scarf. I have to stretch all his legs to each side and his head got heat too easliy. It's too long and VERY HOT even under the ac. It made more rash on my baby. I'm going to return this right away . Very disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: ES&Andy

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product a lot. Sturdy, durable, nice color options. It's got a slight stretch to it. It fits both me and my husband. I greatly prefer it over our ErgoBaby360 for our newborn. He goes right to sleep in it. Easy instructions and videos can be found all over for wraps like these. I love thr price point as well. My baby does seem to get warm at normal temperatures, but it's a really minor issue and not that bad. I love the info material that comes with the product. It makes you feel like they really care.
customer_reviews.author: Emari Yokota

customer_reviews.title: Better than expensive alternatives, puts baby right to sleep
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, better than the expensive alternatives. I’d recommend watching a couple YouTube videos, as the video here makes it look easy, but i found better ways to put baby in the wrap from other videos. I do use the basic tie featured in the videos here, but other YouTube videos better showed me how to make the straps in front a “pocket” to hold baby. Other than that though, product is straightforward, worth the money. I am a little bigger, and had to tie it in the back. Works the same. Don’t stress about trying to make it tie in the front if it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: Arantxa

customer_reviews.title: Decent for price
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time today with my 3 week old. He loved it! It was about 70 degrees with a breeze and he was pretty warm when I took him out. Not the most breathable fabric. Also— I’m 5’5”, 170 and wear a M/L. I consider myself average. It’s not super duper long once it’s wrapped around you. I had just enough to double knot it. So, beware if you are needing something larger.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it, Mom loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves to be in this wrap. I started using it before he was a month old and he would always sleep being close to me. Even now at 6 months he still loves it. It's so great to use even just around the house to have your hands free. The only time it's inconvenient is in very warm weather, when the body heat makes it worse for both of you, but for all other situations it's super comfortable. Easy to put on, too, I got the hang of it by the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Material might vary by color
customer_reviews.text: I got this wrap in black and in grey. The black material is stretchier and by far much more comfortable than the grey because of it. My daughter loves being in both. The grey is thicker and warmer. The black had rounded ends while the grey doesn’t. All in all, great product. What caught my eye about this particular wrap was the logo; cute and simple. I’ve been able to wear the black comfortably even when my daughter isn’t in it whereas I have not been able to do that with the grey—the grey just feels bulky. I’m 5’3” and about 189 pounds (2 mos. pp). Have plenty of extra fabric with both colors.
customer_reviews.author: MyrAme

customer_reviews.title: Best new baby purchase you can make
customer_reviews.text: I tried carriers in the past that never worked. I don't know if it was the easy to watch and understand video that prompted me to buy it, or is having a second baby just made me more confident. But following around a toddler with a brand new baby in tow is 100 times easier than I anticipated by being able to wear the baby. I get stopped almost daily to be asked about it I have pictures taken constantly. This was by far the best $30 that I have spent for this child.
customer_reviews.author: STINA

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap
customer_reviews.text: The wrap came nicely packaged. It's great quality, very soft and durable. Easy to figure out how to wrap around. My 6 week old baby falls asleep immediately. I'm 5'7 size 14 and I have to tie it in the back. I would like to tie it in the front. It's a long wrap so it's takes a minute to put it on and take off but it's not hard. I can get things done around home with baby in wrap. Not sure how it would work when baby gets bigger and heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to put on
customer_reviews.text: Bought to wear baby around the house and out and about when very small. Didn’t end up using, I like our more structured carrier much better! Certainly not as easy to put on as video makes it seem especially if you are by yourself. I read these wraps do take some getting used to but I just didn’t feel the baby was secure enough and was always worried about his head being turned so he could breathe. Fabric was nice and soft and long enough to get around me.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Garvick

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent! It is worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is a MIRACLE! I have a very small baby girl. 5lbs 11oz and she can't fit in ANYTHING i have for her right now. (She hardly fits in her carseat)😣 I needed something to carry her around in when i go places and this wrap does the job so PERFECTLY. She sleeps so good in it because she is so comfy. I thank god for this wonderful invention💜
customer_reviews.author: Davona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing is how it was described
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister, and she loves it! I told her to watch the YouTube videos, like one of the other reviewers suggested. She said she swore for the first 20 minutes trying to figure out how to wrap it. But she figured it out and loves it, she said my nephew falls asleep within minutes! And now she can get up and move around the house chasing after the crazy toddler🤪. I’m so glad I bought this for her!
customer_reviews.author: shannan,shannan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing AND affordable!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap!! I had purchased a thinner one before on accident and it lost its stretch super fast! Waste of money, then I got this one , came super fast, is perfect size, also great for plus size, very breathable, and baby sleeps wonderful in it! I do like to fan the fabric out on my shoulders unlike the stock phone and it works perfectly! Thank you so much for a great AND affordable product!
customer_reviews.author: Jsskanic12

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars if it wasn’t so long!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this sling, it’s super breathable which is a necessity being in this Florida heat. It’s also super easy to put together once you get the hang of it, the only complaint I have is how long it is; I wish it came in different sizes for different heights. Im 5’5 and when I’m putting it on it drags on the floor because it’s so long so I usually put it on in the car which is a hassle so it doesn’t get dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Jason English

customer_reviews.title: Must have !
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to “wear” my baby but it has changed our life. I have a 2 year old and a new born and this frees me up to still pay attention to my toddler. It took a couple tries to get used to but I’m feeling more confident everyday. My newborn also has reflux and colic and she falls asleep within 15 minutes now! It’s a soft comfy material and doesn’t make me sweat or hurt my back.
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I love that I can carry my baby and still be hands free. Definitely a must have. I usually use it when I have to go to the stores. I just plop him in it and he goes right to sleep, no fussy baby. I suggest YouTubing the instructions on how to put the sling on as it can be a bit tricky at first but after the first try or so it becomes very easy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice carrier
customer_reviews.text: I got this carrier for my newborn to use until she could hold her head up enough. It kept her tight and cozy, I even nursed her in it. I did two trial runs before actually using it out and about to get the hang of it, it's easy after reading the directions and doing it a few times. She never shifted involuntarily in it and I even used the restroom with her in it. I would get warm and sweaty on my back where the wrap was but it wasn't terrible. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea c.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this wrap and the price.
customer_reviews.text: This wrap was great for me when my daughter was born. I have other carriers but like this one because I could sit down with her still in it easier than my others and nurse her the easiest in this. Wore this a lot around the house, on walks, at the store. My kids are 14 months apart so I liked how easy and quick this was to use and I could still get my toddler taken care of too while wearing my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. I do see what some of the reviewers are saying about it being small. Im a size large in tops and 12 in pants, and at first I could barely get it all the way around. But after using it all day the first time, it stretched out and there's now a bunch of extra material. On the baby side, he loves it! He sleeps so great in it and it's easy to bottle feed him. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: dtownley

customer_reviews.title: Great baby shower present
customer_reviews.text: Best Buy, loved having my baby close to me. Also my son had severe skin allergies but the fabric was so soft and durable that he never had a reaction. So just having a great experience I would definitely buy as a baby shower present
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.text: If you have a super high maintenance newborn you definitely need one of these !! My family lives really far away so I don’t have all the help I need. However, within a couple of minutes Of wearing this sling My baby fell asleep instantly and I was able to knock out some chores AND was even able to teach my other son how to properly kick a soccer ball (with baby attached)!! Wouldn’t recommend you play soccer lol but it definitely kept my baby well contained and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: wortiz04

customer_reviews.title: The best wrap I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I love my wrap! It is very comfortable and easy to figure out. I've tried other wraps that were made far too long or out of very heavy material. My daughter fits well in it and I find it easier to get things done. Most importantly, I feel like she is safe and will not fall. However, we do get a little toasty at times but nothing too extreme. I would expect it to get warm with us being wrapped to each other.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Must have for momma and baby.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 month old baby now. I have used this product since day 1. Having this has helped out so much when I need to be hands free and all my baby wants to be held. It is so comfy I can wear it around my house and when we are out and about. It is very easy to use once you get the hang of it. I watched a lot of YouTube. Now I can get it on within seconds. Overall great product and a life saver.
customer_reviews.author: LHSTX95

customer_reviews.title: OMG Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Ok so the instructions were not the easiest to follow in terms of how to use the wrap but once I got it, OMG! This is the best wrap ever! I am glad I did not buy the one from the retailer that was $139. This one suffices and is comfortable for me and my baby. Love it and it has a lot of material for when your baby grows. Yes yes yes!
customer_reviews.author: Roaringqueen

customer_reviews.title: Easy and secure
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I had to watch YouTube videos on how to wrap it but once accomplished '' piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and convenient when trying to put my baby to sleep and doing things around the house. I do find myself having to retighten after taking my son out for a feeding and putting him back to sleep which was expected. Other than I love it and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McGee

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this one instead of other high end brand name wraps. It works just as good and i love how there’s many different colors offered. I purchased the pink and it’s very cute. Just need to review YouTube instruction videos to have a better visual of how to wrap correctly. At first it looked and felt a little off but after a few times you get the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Feels nice and seems like a well made product
customer_reviews.text: Mine came in with a damaged packaging, the edges of the product box popped open. It seems like the glue wasn’t strong enough. But the product is totally unharmed, feels really nice to the touch. Comes with a travel matching pouch which is a great. It is stretchy but not too stretchy that it will make you feel like baby is not support well. I haven’t tested it out yet with baby, waiting for her to arrive and cuddle!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Not too secure..
customer_reviews.text: Can't get it to hold my newborn up. She constantly slides down and I feel i need to use both my arms to hold her which defeats the purpose of the sling. The front backpack we have for her feels more secure in holding her.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Just What I was Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten a Moby wrap a few months ago, and even in the cold, after about a half hour both me and baby were over heating--which is why I got this wrap, which is a quite a bit thinner, but not too thin. I think that it will be much better for days during the summer and fall time. It is a little stretchier than the Moby, so I wrapped baby a little too loosely the first couple times I wore him, so keep in mind you may have to wrap it a bit tighter if you're used to Moby.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: not much material left over
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is thick and stretchy. I wish there were instructions on how to carry the baby in different ways. I don't have much fabric left when I tie the wrap the way the instructions show (I was a size L and XL in maternity clothes, and have not lost my pregnancy weight yet). It does hold the baby up, but since she cant hold her head up steadily yet, I have to hold her head unless she is asleep against me.
customer_reviews.author: TaylorJ

customer_reviews.title: So soft!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical of how much I would like this wrap because of the price. (Other brands —and the one I was going to buy— were much more expensive, but we decided to try it out anyways.) I absolutely LOVE this wrap. The material feels nice and soft and durable, baby loves it, very comfy and easy to wear. I use this wrap daily! I definitely recommend this wrap carrier!
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money! Love being able to be hands free with a happy newborn
customer_reviews.text: At first glance when I unrolled it I kind of thought why didnt I just go buy 100 yards of fabric. . But then after trying to put it on and doing it too low I watched a couple videos and was successful on the 2nd attempt and my newborn loved it!!! She stayed content in there for hours and even fell asleep. I was able to do my morning chores while she happily watched. I put it on her dad and he liked it also! Super stretchy fabric makes it easy to get nice and tight. I think its worth it for sure if your a busy body like me!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, allows for skin to skin
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly really like this. Material is soft and not at all uncomfortable to wear. The soft fabric and fact that the baby is right on me without any fabric between allow for me to put her in while just in a diaper so I can maximize skin to skin. I thought it would be difficult to figure out how to wrap but it really isn’t once I learned how. It’s a little difficult to get her into it if I’m alone but I’ll probably get better at that with some practice. All in all would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ElizAck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is pretty awesome. I was intimidated by the directions but it’s actually pretty easy to wrap around you. The wrap just fits around me and I am a size L in basic shirts and pants to give you an idea. But it’s very stretchy so it doesn’t feel too tight on me or baby. My girl falls asleep in it easy and I can do so much more around the house being hands free. I’m so glad that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: I love this wrap
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrap. It's easy to tie, stretchy but strong, and very comfortable to wear. I have three children three and under and this has been great for my baby who is now two months old. I used a sling for the first few weeks but she has outgrown it. I have a carrier that buckles and all that, but she doesn't like it and it hurts my back. I did watch some videos on YouTube to see how to tie it and get the baby in with ease. There are certain ways to position baby's legs depending on how old they are to prevent hip dysplasia--so I would recommend looking that up. I would totally buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Best product
customer_reviews.text: The cuddle bug does everything it says.The material is strong. I feel so secure carring my new born baby in it. I'm a plus size woman over 200 pounds I have more than enough room to carry my baby and yet extra material left over. This item is my best friend I don't know what I was doing before I had the cuddle bug. I get compliments Everywhere I Go. Awesome product love it
customer_reviews.author: Kendra768

customer_reviews.title: Best baby buy!
customer_reviews.text: I just had my 8th (and last) baby in July. I always wanted to try the wraps but just never did. It looked complicated and uncomfortable. This time around I decided to give it a try and bought this one as it came highly recommended by a friend who is an experienced baby wearer. I must say.... I LOVE IT! Wish I would have done this wrap thing with my other kiddos! It's so easy to do, especially for a newbie! And it's so comfortable while also feeling secure. MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but not comfortable or easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how this is “9-in-1.” There appears to only be one way to wear this wrap. While I liked the idea, it feels more constricting to baby than our more structured baby carrier. Additionally it’s difficult to get the wrap on without dragging the ends across the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: I am always raving about how great this wrap is
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars but just today (about 4 months afternoon purchasing) there is a rip in it, right at the seam where the Cuddlebug part is. I am always raving about how great this wrap is, especially the price in comparison to the more expensive Moby wrap etc. the wrap works great, but I’m a bit bummed that there is a rip in it that will most likely grow as I use it more.
customer_reviews.author: Erlene R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy for mom, puzzle for dad
customer_reviews.text: Putting this on is like putting on a men’s neck-tie (which for me has never been easy). What’s worse is that you’re supposed to wrap this complicated thing together in order to cradle a squirming delicate baby. Makes me too nervous to use it. My wife is fine with it, but for me I’d prefer if it used Velcro or some combination of Velcro and buttons. Keep it simple!
customer_reviews.author: MorningSun

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it with baby yet but...
customer_reviews.text: I did a practice run with my 2 year old's baby doll (official test dummy) and I feel confident using it. The instructions spell out how to wrap it nicely and the fabric breathes well (I live in the south so that is a must) but is still sturdy. It's also quite soft. I look forward to using this with Baby #2!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great investment! Love this wrap!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wrap! It works amazing for my little one. He was born 7wks premature and only weighed 4lbs 10oz when we left the hospital, he fit very snug and safely in the wrap. I get compliments on it all the time when I'm out. Plus having him close to me ensures less random people trying to touch him and ensures he's less likely to be exposed to all their germs. Not to mention it frees up my hands for my other 2 children while grocery shopping and walking around. As I said, I love this wrap and look forward to using it more and more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this wrap, but it’s way too stretchy. No matter how tight I wrap it, the baby sags all the way to my tummy. I tried wrapping super tight, making the knot higher, nothing helps. On top of that it’s very thick. It’s just spring time here and my baby and I are soaked from a short walk in the sun. Just ok; but I wouldn’t have bought it if I knew it will be like this
customer_reviews.author: Kristinasv

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! It's truly a lifesaver!!! Baby cried hysterically the first time I used it, so I gave up on it at first thinking it was a failure. But then desperate times encouraged me to use it again, and I'm so glad I did!! I was able to calm a fussy baby after walking around for 30 seconds, and then I could finally get a few things done around the house!! My advice to any new mom is to get the Cuddlebug, and try it out a few times before giving up on it! It does get easier to tie after a few uses, and the baby will absolutely love it, even it she may not at first :)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Kramer

customer_reviews.title: On the go mom? This is perfect for you.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be a genius!! If you don’t want the hassle of a stroller and want to be handsfree this is the product for you. They say babies favorite place is moms chest and it’s beneficial for newborns to be close to their moms. Well it’s true because every time I carry my daughter in this she falls asleep instantly and does not mind running errands with mom. I will say I had a hard time at first using it but as always when you use new products it takes practice.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable ans Easy to wear!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars this product is amazing for those moms who wanna feel close with their baby and handsfree my little girl is 5 months and likes being in the cuddle bug. Aside from how comfortable it was for baby and myself. It is so easy to wear just follow the instructions a few practices and you will be a pro. You can even wear your baby looking out a feature my little girl loved. Perfect for those grocery shopping trips or mall walks when you don't wanna push a stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Baby Wearing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to allow me to do more while carrying my newborn. It is relatively easy to use (once you get it wrapped around you--it's long and my arms are not as cooperative). It's lightweight. My daughter loves being in it--it keeps her close and warm while I have both hands free to do odds and ends. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C.

customer_reviews.title: Great carrier and reasonably priced!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this right away. I have another carrier and none of my kids have liked it. I wanted to try a wrap style and this one had good reviews with a reasonable price. Some mentioned having to watch videos but the instructions that were included were sufficient for me. I have only tried the infant carry method. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Becki M.

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: I will say, this probably isn't for bigger babies. A more structured carrier like a Tula or Lillebaby or Ergo would probably be best for bigger babies. Tried it out with my 2 month old as soon as it was delivered and we LOVE it! So much more comfortable for around the house wearing. My Tula just wasn't cutting it for "hey, let's wash bottles" when baby wants to be held. I used the "how to" video on Youtube and it was so easy to wrap! My son is currently sleeping away comfortably on my chest. I can finally get things done again!
customer_reviews.author: Darian Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Me and baby both LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my baby both LOVE this thing!! She gets to be close to mommy but mommy can still get stuff done around the house lol. After watching a quick YouTube video, it was really easy to figure out the wrap. I agree with the reviews that say it’s kind of short so it might not make it back around to tie in the front if you’re a bigger size. I’m a size 2-4 and sometimes when it’s freshly washed I feel like there’s not too much extra length so it might not work for someone bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Great baby carrier
customer_reviews.text: We love the cuddle bug wrap! I got the yellow, which I haven't seen available in other brands. It is super comfy, and easy(ish) to use if you follow directions. I feel very secure carrying my baby in this wrap. Update: after using it a few times, as my baby got heavier, it no longer feels as secure. The fabric stretches. And after awhile wearing it, I feel like I need to rewrap it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Light, good fabric material and useful
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time mom and I love this baby wrap. I have tried other structured baby carriers and none of them impressed me. Baby wrap sling fits into my diaper bag, it doesn’t take up space like the structured ones. I like the fact that it is light and secure, good fabric material. I learnt how to wrap a few times and it is now easy to use, I carry it in my diaper bag.
customer_reviews.author: K T Aung

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable for me and I think my baby is comfortable too, for the most part. It keeps him tightly near me, which we both like. The only thing I don’t care for is that there isn’t really any neck support. I find myself constant having my hand on his head for fear that hits going to flail around. I compare this product to a front/back pack, which does support everything. It’s just not as comfortable as this wrap, it’ll probably be better when my 6 week old gets older and can hold his neck up better on his own. Overall, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel T

customer_reviews.title: Nice but itchy fabric. Short.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to use this to have skin to skin contact with baby. When I tried putting it on it was itchy on skin. What you don't see on the picture is that one side of the fabric is soft (that's the one you see) while the back is itchy and has the seams. It's also relatively short so may not be a good choice for larger people.
customer_reviews.author: Neda

customer_reviews.title: The wrap is longer than I expected. Be sure to bundle up your baby correctly & securely.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves this. She takes care of my baby while I work full time. She carries my baby around with her everywhere rather than in a stroller because its too heavy for my mom to carry up and down the stairs from the porch even though the stroller is foldable. My baby wants to go out all the time and whines when she can't if its raining. This makes it easier for myself and my mom to carry her around just for a stroll around the block.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, Instructions Lacking
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars only because the information and instructions provided by the company were lacking, especially for first time users, plus sized moms and newborn carrying, I had to search YouTube for relevant tutorials. Aside from having to search for outside instruction I am pleased with the product. Seems to be high quality, love the packaging and the bag included for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Christina P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, could be longer.
customer_reviews.text: I like this carrier over the more structured ones as it’s softer and seems more comfy for baby. The material has a little stretch to it which helps the baby fit better. The fabric could be longer, I’m 5’2” and 138lbs and after putting this on there’s not much left to tie the knot.
customer_reviews.author: D456

customer_reviews.title: A little too finicky for busy moms
customer_reviews.text: As a mom of three ages four and under i was hoping for something that was a little less finicky. Not comfortable if the wrap isn’t flat, best if you do the wrap in the mirror til you get the hang of it and not very breathable fabric so not great for warmer weather. Next time I’ll purchase a ring sling instead.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: This wrap works. And it’s convenient. BUT I have previously been using a Boba wrap and the material on the boba is wayyy more comfy for mom and baby. This one just doesn’t compare. I got this as a cheaper second wrap for when I wash the boba, but you can def tell it’s the cheaper one. It works but It’s not my fav
customer_reviews.author: Sharon N.

customer_reviews.title: Not an ERGO! Too long and too much work
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product is not an ergo, it has a completely different brand sewn on the front. I really didn’t like having to spend so much time twisting and tying. I’m 5 ft tall so there was a lot of excess fabric so it just was a pain in the butt. I rarely use it but when I did it was nice, just too difficult for if you’re jumping in and out of the car
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing and so is the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wrap. We own two for our twins. They are easy to use and work great. We were able to use one for our twins when they were little and it's even strong enough to hold our 2 1/2 year old. The material is super soft. The price is great too, other brands are overpriced for the same thing. So glad we have these!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Could be longer...
customer_reviews.text: It could definitely be longer. I'm of average size and once I've got this wrap on, it barely leaves enough fabric to tie in the front. When my baby is no longer a newborn, I'm afraid I won't be able to use this as there won't be enough fabric to tie in the front. Wish I had spent a little more and purchased a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I was terrified to use this at first but the first time I used it and saw how calm and comfortable my daughter was I became a daily user. She falls right asleep. This is how I get things done around the house. I thought I would probably feel all the weight on my back but not at all it’s very light. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Estefanny Sigala

customer_reviews.title: My Wife Loved this!
customer_reviews.text: We had several harness-style baby carriers purchased prior to the birth of our first born and my wife hated all of them! Her back hurt, they didn't support the babies head, she couldn't see the baby well enough, etc. etc. Then we found the CuddleBug and our son became exactly that - he loved snuggling up next to Mom while wrapped securely. It was so comfortable our son even fell asleep at times while wrapped up in this on her. My wife couldn't have been happier and we made great use out of this. Would recommend this to anyone and might give family members these as gifts we're that happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: K Martin

customer_reviews.title: Loooove It!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to learn how to use; the print is cute and fun; Snug and safe; Great quality; no pain even after hours of wearing with 12 lb baby; the length will grow with me and baby. I'm returning the K'tan which was impossible for me to use for some reason and way too snug even though I was at the low end of sizing. I highly recommend this wrap for all mommas out there!
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only gotten to use my wrap once so far but seriously love it! My sister had given me her baby ktan as a ‘hand me down’ and i was able to use it with my little one for the first month of so but I’m a different size then my sister and so it didn’t fit for long. I wanted something me and my husband could wear and something that was comfortable! I’ve loved the cuddle bug so far and love that my back and hips don’t hurt while wearing it. It’s also nice to be able to wear it in the car and when we get to our destination i can just slip baby in and go!
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Maybe we are missing something
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, we loved the idea of this carrier, but we don’t love the actual carrier. It’s not super easy to use and our little baby girl (not really little, she’s 9lb) just kinda slips down and feels like she’s going to fall out. Just doesn’t seem very secure and it ends up covering her face completely. We don’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wrap but too thick
customer_reviews.text: It’s thick fabric so it’s not exactly breathable wrap. Both my baby and I love it. Just he gets too hot after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great, convenient, comfy
customer_reviews.text: I was a little overwhelmed when I first opened it and saw how long it was but it was honestly so easy to put on! I watched a YouTube tutorial although the instructions they send are actually really helpful! I just wanted to see someone else do it first! It's super comfy and easy to adjust and my daughter loves it!! She loves being close and it was super convenient for me! It's so great to be able to carry her in this instead of lugging her around in her car seat! I have and would recommend this to people!
customer_reviews.author: savanah hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use and works well for my needs. I haven't tried wearing it in a way other than the recommended way, but there is plenty of fabric to mess around with. My daughter sleeps the whole time she's in it which allows me time to do things with both hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Dubinsky

product_meta.title: CuddleBug Baby Wrap Sling + Carrier - Newborns & Toddlers up to 36 lbs - Hands Free - Gentle, Stretch Fabric - Ideal for Baby Showers - One Size Fits All (Grey)
feature_bullets: Lifetime Manufacturer's Warranty on all CuddleBug Items
ALL-IN-ONE - So many different ways to comfortably carry your baby HANDS FREE! Newborn hold, breastfeed sling, front carry, side carry, cross carry, hip carry, kangaroo carry, side sling.
GET THINGS DONE WHILE BONDING - Develop strong emotional bonds and constant stimulation with the flexibility and freedom to go where you want and get things done.

COMFORTABLE AND SECURE - Support your baby in this MACHINE WASHABLE buckle-free, ring-free, Premium blend of 95% Cotton, 5% spandex. As gentle as wearing a T-shirt but strong enough to support your baby’s head.

SIMPLE, EASY-TO-USE, SINGLE-PERSON INSTRUCTiONS - Zero frustration instructions. Quick learning curve. You’ll be on the move in no time with the easy-to-follow instructions for any carry. From car-seat to CuddleWrapped in as little as 1 minute. Even with a fussy baby.
GIVE BACK - A portion of your purchase goes to support the Guatemalan charity “Long Way Home” which provides self-sufficient schools for communities in need.

specifications.Care instructions: Give your baby a cleaner World! All our items come in a recycled eco-friendly packaging!
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,918 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
